text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump That's right.  Take credit for people reclaiming the jobs they lost during the Covid-19 lockdowns.  Sophistry! Better the Administration should take credit for creating the job losses in the first place by failing to immediately act to aggressively curb the viral spread.
